alldb.table_sql: select TT.id id, TT.proj_id projid, TT.code code, TT.TASK_name taskname, TT.start_time starttime, TT.end_time endtime, trunc(to_date(TT.end_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')-to_date(TT.start_time,'yyyy-mm-dd'))||'å¤©' AS duartiontime from TASK_TIME TT where 1=1 /~projid: and TT.proj_id = '{projid}'~/
